aria_snapshots.alternative:
Use page.evaluate() to query ARIA attributes directly:
  const label = await page.evaluate(() => document.querySelector('button').getAttribute('aria-label'));

clock_api.alternative:
Use page.evaluate() with manual Date mocking:
  await page.evaluate(() => { Date.now = () => 1234567890000; });

locator_or.alternative:
Chain multiple locator.first() or use CSS :is() selector:
  page.locator(':is(button, [role="button"])')

locator_and.alternative: Use more specific selectors or chain filter() calls

component_testing.alternative: Use E2E testing approach - mount component in test page

esm_imports.notes: CommonJS module system - use require() for imports

dialog_api.notes: page.on('dialog') available but newer API methods not present

mask_option.alternative: Use page.evaluate() to hide elements before screenshot
